mapper.sql: id , yearid, unitid, m6, m7, m8, m9, m10, m11, m12, m1, m2, m3, m4, m5, total, pretotal, preestimate, createtime, updatetime, subjectid, agenttype, name, happencount, elasticflag, elasticmax, elasticratio, budgetsubjectid, productid, addmoney, lendoutmoney, lendinmoney, executemoney, computingprocess, remark
mapper.select:
SELECT count(0) FROM budget_year_agent AS _agent INNER JOIN budget_subject AS _subject ON _agent.subjectid = _subject.id AND _agent.yearid = _subject.yearid WHERE _subject.jointproductflag = 1 AND _subject.costsplitflag = 1 AND _agent.id IN
#{item}
